name: The 1945
description:
Nama Tim: booleh

Asal Instansi: Universitas Indonesia

Anggota Tim: Abdul Rafi, Muhammad Navis Raditya Riayatsyah

The 1945

Menceritakan tentang seorang pejuang yang ingin menyelamatkan teman-temannya yang menghilang. Pejuang tersebut menyeberangi lautan dan mencari ke dalam beberapa pulau namun tak berhasil menemukan mereka.

Di The 1945, rasakan sensasi seorang pejuang yang berjuang untuk mencari teman-temannya dan melawan segala rintangan yang ada di hadapannya!

Game Control:

W, A, S, D = movement

R = Reload

Left Click = Shoot

Right Click = Interact with object

F = Interact with environment (guided)

Left Shift = Dash

1, 2, 3 = Weapon Select

Scroll Wheel = Weapon Color Change

Game Mechanics:

- Akan memberikan damage kepada musuh yang memiliki warna yang sama dengan peluru

- Dapat berinteraksi dengan objek sebagai tempat berlindung dari serangan musuh

The Developers:

- Programmer: Abdul Rafi

- Scene Editor: Abdul Rafi

- Visual Assets Creator: Muhammad Navis Raditya Riayatsyah

- Map Designer: Muhammad Navis Raditya Riayatsyah

- Game Concept: both of us :D

=== Premade Asset ===

Font: Upheaval TT (https://www.dafont.com/upheaval.font)

Pathfinding Algorithm: https://arongranberg.com/astar/

Audio:

- Shoot: Lightsaber Ignition by pip - source: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/lightsaber-ignition-6816/

- Dash: Clean fast Swoosh.aiff by Danjocross - source: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/clean-fast-swooshaiff-14784/

- Hit/Dead: Ough! by Topschool - source: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/ough-47202/

- Reload: Shell load by CeebFrack - source: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/shell-load-87813/

- Barbed Wire Drop: Dropping Bag on Floor by ftpalad - source: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/dropping-bag-on-floor-107890/

- Main Menu BGM: Degraded Old Sound Documentary Style by Liecio - source: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/degraded-old-sound-documentary-style-109764/

- Gameplay BGM: Lofi Ambient-PianoLine-03 by SamuelFrancisJohnson - source: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/lofi-ambient-pianoline-03-116136/

- Winning Condition BGM: The portal in this garden leads directly to the desired place by SamuelFrancisJohnson - source: https://pixabay.com/music/ambient-the-portal-in-this-garden-leads-directly-to-th...

- Losing Condition BGM: Guitar Ambient Fades into Oblivion by SamuelFrancisJohnson - source: https://pixabay.com/music/ambient-guitar-ambient-fades-into-oblivion-128863/
